# rtx_ddns_status (Data Source)

Retrieves DDNS registration status information from RTX routers. This includes status for both NetVolante DNS and custom DDNS providers.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `type` (String) Type of DDNS status to retrieve: 'netvolante', 'custom', or 'all' (default).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `statuses` (List of Object) List of DDNS status entries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--statuses))

<a id="nestedatt--statuses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `statuses`

Read-Only:

- `current_ip` (String)
- `error_message` (String)
- `hostname` (String)
- `interface` (String)
- `last_update` (String)
- `server_id` (Number)
- `status` (String)
- `type` (String)
